name: §c§nLight Body II
description: Your agility based physique comes with some consequences.

text: Due to having a heavy agility based build, you had to give up defence and risk the possibility of getting crippled.
You cannot wear any armor stronger than leather armor.
Whenever you get hit, you will be crippled, receiving §cSlowness V§r for §c4§r seconds.
Despite having all the stamina required to assassinate a target, you exhaust quicker and need to eat more due to the large amounts of energy being used up for assassinations.
All foods will restore §c50%§r of its original amount for food.
